About Me

A Few Things About Me...

BIO

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

Military Background

Help Desk at Headquarters & Cannon Crew Member MOS 13B, 13D

I was in charge of Building & Maintain the HR website for the Utah National Guard. I also served as the helpdesk for the SIDPERS & PSB Departments. I was also in the Field Artillery. 13D Field Artillery Automated Tactical Data Systems Specialist & 13B Cannon Crew Member.

Logistic Manager

Manager Over Shipping, Product Purchasing, & Online Content Manager

I worked for Liquidation Team for 8 years. I managed all our online sales, ordering products, testing electronics, Posting products online, & making sure the products shipped out.

DevMountain Bootcamp

Graduated From DevMountain Full Stack Web Developer

I went to DevMountain where I developed skills with JavaScript, React, Express, PostreSQL, Jest, HTML, CSS, Styled Components, Twilio, SASS, & other technologies. I created a Personal Project, dog-cuts.com & worked with a great team of coworkers build a group app, head-games.org.
